message: The xml:id of the TEI element should be equal to the name of the file, without the file extension. Currently the value of xml:id is "SSK_sc_DTABf" whilst the file name is "SSK_sc_DTABf.xml"
TEI/@type should be either "researchScenario" or "researchStep". The current value of TEI/@type is "researchScenario"
When recording a revision, some precise metadata must be given : the date of the revision, the name of the responsibe and his/her affiliation and a description.
In the <desc type="definition>, there should be nothing more than text, <list> and <ref>.
More than 4 terms of the same vocabulary type may be too much: OBJECT
The attribute source is important to specifiy which vocabulary was used. The main ones are "tadirah", aurehal, "standard".
sourceDesc in mandatory in TEI, so if you want to give details on the way the scenario was conceived, it is the appropriate location.
The title of a scenario should describe the main goal of the scenario.
The activity terms are more suitable for describing steps rather than scenarios. It is recommended to choose one activity term per scenario step.
